subject: 两人携手走向山巅，背影渐行渐远
detail: 2D Chinese animation style, two figures walking hand-in-hand toward the mountain peak, their silhouettes gradually receding into the distance; first the rising sun illuminates their backs, then reveals the sharp contour of Lingjian Mountain’s summit, and finally bathes the entire dawn sky in golden light; horizontal tracking shot; background wind rustling and subtle heartbeat rhythm; Background sound: gentle wind rustling through mountain pines and soft, steady heartbeat. Voiceover says in Chinese "爱恨终成过往，携手共赴未来。"
image_detail: (2D国漫风格)，灵剑山巅，两人背对背行走，背景是朝阳，高清晰度，8K画质
narration: 爱恨终成过往，携手共赴未来。
